posts.post_content:
I love that dude, not only because of the art.  
- Your opponent has weenies and you play this, then they are doomed. Either when this stays in play or when it dies.  
- If unblocked it deals a nice 3 damage each turn to your opponents.  
- If it's blocked it kills even 4 toughness creatures.  
- When it blocks it still kills 3 toughness creatures.  
- if you put any form of lifelink on him (best [loxodon warhammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=loxodon warhammer)) he gains you tons of life just by sitting around, from the damage it deals to itself, each player and each other creature.  
- and if you really need to clear the table, play a second of these little buggers. Then they destroy each other in the next turn, dealing a total of 4 damage to everything.
posts.html:
I love that dude, not only because of the art.
- Your opponent has weenies and you play this, then they are doomed. Either when this stays in play or when it dies.
- If unblocked it deals a nice 3 damage each turn to your opponents.
- If it's blocked it kills even 4 toughness creatures.
- When it blocks it still kills 3 toughness creatures.
- if you put any form of lifelink on him (best loxodon warhammer) he gains you tons of life just by sitting around, from the damage it deals to itself, each player and each other creature.
- and if you really need to clear the table, play a second of these little buggers. Then they destroy each other in the next turn, dealing a total of 4 damage to everything.

posts.post_content:
Isn't this also called "Bad Potato"? Great with [Soul Link](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Soul Link), [Lifelink](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lifelink), [Spirit Link](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spirit Link). A friend of mine also comboes it with [Rude Awakening](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rude Awakening), very funny.
  
   
@John-Bender: Strange that you say that, Plague Spitter always reminded me vaguely of the "Sandcrawler" from Star Wars, the vehicle with which the Jawas collected forgotten trash in the desert.
posts.html:

Nasty critter, 1 of this on the field is enough to make weenie decks cry. This guy is also strong enough to smash any 4 toughness creature on offense or 3 on defense. Can kill shroud creatures such as [Blurred Mongoose](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blurred Mongoose) with ease  
4.5/5

Want to clean up all the creatures in a multi player? Combine it with deathtouch, pop a [Virulent Swipe](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Virulent Swipe) just before the upkeep effect, or just keep [Basilisk Collar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Basilisk Collar) equiped.  
  
Also note the horrific effect [Quietus Spike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Quietus Spike) would have .... ;p
